data.title: Action Films
data.meta_description: Film Genres - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document describes various film genres and sub-genres. The main genres covered are action, adventure, comedy, crime/gangster, drama, epics/historical, horror, musicals/dance, science fiction, war films, and westerns. It also discusses many sub-genres like biopics, chick flicks, courtroom dramas, detective/mystery, disaster films, fantasy, film noir, guy films, melodramas/weepers, road films, romance, sports films, superheroes, supernatural, thriller/suspense, and zombie films. Other categories mentioned are animated films, British films, children/family films, classic films, cult films, documentary films, and
